<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Gravedigger](/NPCs.aspx?ID=916)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

An often-overlooked group of laborers, gravediggers have a reputation for being as quiet and grim as their workplace. They are commonly strong and tough from their long hours of backbreaking labor, and they tend to have a unique perspective on life and death.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Gravedigger](/NPCs.aspx?ID=916)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 223</row>

**Perception** +6

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Graveyard Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +4, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[bull's-eye lantern](/Equipment.aspx?ID=29) (2 oils), gravedigger's garb (functions as [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)), [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14), [shovel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=59)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +4 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 22

**Resistances**
negative 2

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shovel +9,
**Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning

**Light in the Dark** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The gravedigger holds a [bull's-eye lantern](/Equipment.aspx?ID=29) in one hand and their [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) in the other, and the lantern contains oil; **Effect** The gravedigger recites a brief chant to ignite their lantern with positive energy. Each [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creature in a 15-foot line takes 3d6 positive damage (DC 14 basic Fortitude save). This action uses all remaining oil in the bull's-eye lantern.

</column>
